fields.name: Active Skill: Abyss Roar
fields.value:
• Mephisto’s <Abyss Roar> skill will deal large damage to enemy units.
• Range: 18

fields.name: Passive Skill: Breath of Hell
fields.value: • Mephisto will increase the attack and health of all allied units.

fields.name: Legendary Skill:
fields.value:
• After several basic attacks, awakened Mephisto will trigger the <Resurrection> skill which resurrects a dead Dark troops as a demon.
• Trigger Number: 2
